name: Neo Technology Mexico
overview:
Neo Technology is a company of young enterprising people, 100% Mexican, whose mission is the commitment with technological development, in order to help other companies in a strategic way to achieve high levels of competitiveness required at present. Neo Technology has developed the first mexican antivirus, called Neo Security Antivirus. Neo Security Antivirus is a powerful tool that protects users from online threats, keeping their computers safe from malicious codes.

Neo Security Antivirus engine offers: • highest virus detection rate • the fastest new threat response time • support for over 1,800 archiving and compression utility formats • High performance due to its Penta-Engine: 2 Heuristic Engines 2 Engines of singatures and 1 collective intelligence engine.

• Scanning of HTTP traffic “on the fly” • Definition of a list of trusted addresses • Scanning of critical system areas and autostart objects • Updating of the autostart objects database • “On –the fly” antivirus scanning of IMAP4 protocol emails • Specification of the port number in mail traffic scanning settings • Easy to use and intuitive design makes it the best tool to protect, is the best option in the market has ever seen, forget complicated and safety programs that alert and prevent you from working. • Hourly updates and unknown threats response time less than 3 hours
